values.placeholder: Action Copy, Banana, Action Paste, Website link

values.option: Flat – simple flat design, clean shapes, no gradients, no shadows, minimalistic modern UI look.
Outline (Stroke) – thin line icons, transparent background, no fills, geometric and clean outline style.
Filled (Solid) – bold solid shapes, fully filled, high-contrast modern icon style.
Material Design – Google Material style, rounded corners, clear geometry, soft drop shadows, modern and functional.
Neumorphic – soft extruded look, subtle highlights and shadows, elements look pressed into or lifted from the background.
Skeuomorphic – realistic icons imitating physical objects, textures and details that look like real life.
Gradient – colorful gradient fills, smooth transitions, modern glossy digital style.
Glassmorphic – translucent glass effect, frosted background blur, glowing highlights, futuristic look.
3D / Isometric – three-dimensional icon with perspective or isometric view, depth and shadows.
Hand-drawn – sketchy lines, imperfect strokes, playful handcrafted look.
Cartoon – bright colors, exaggerated shapes, comic style, fun and playful.
Minimalistic – extremely simplified, few details, focus on clarity and readability.
Pixel Art – retro pixelated look, low resolution, 8-bit video game style.
Line + Fill (Duo style) – combination of outlines with partial fills, modern contrast look.
Monochrome – single color icons, no gradients, simple and universal.
Cyberpunk / Futuristic – neon glow, high-tech shapes, sci-fi futuristic digital aesthetic.
Retro / Vintage – old-school vibe, pastel or muted tones, nostalgic 80s/90s design style.

options.customCss: /* custom CSS trimmed to avoid WAF */

parameters.completionMessage: = Download One more time

parameters.content:
## Step 1 - Form Trigger

Collects three user inputs: Icon Subject, Icon Style, and Background.
This provides the core data the workflow needs to generate the correct icon.
Why: It ensures all later steps receive structured, predictable input.

## Step 2 - Generate optimized icon prompt

Creates a clean, structured JSON prompt using GPT-5.
It defines style, composition, palette, lighting, and constraints for the image.
Why: GPT-Image-1 delivers far better results when fed with precise, consistent parameters instead of raw text.

## Step 3 - Render icon image
Uses GPT-Image-1 to generate a 400×400 PNG with a transparent background based on the optimized prompt.
Returns the image as base64 data.
Why: This model produces high-quality icons suited for UI/UX work.

## Step 4 - Upload to Google Driv

Uploads the generated PNG into the selected Google Drive folder.
Outputs both thumbnailLink and webContentLink for preview and download.
Why: Drive acts as a simple, reliable icon storage library you can access anywhere.

## Step 5 - Display Form Completion

Shows a confirmation card with:
• A thumbnail preview
• A download link
• A “One more time” button
Uses custom CSS for a clean, polished look.
Why: Gives the user immediate visual feedback without leaving the workflow.

## Setup Notes
* Add OpenAI + Google Drive credentials
* Update the Drive folder ID
* Can be adapted for Slack/Teams or external asset libraries
* Works on n8n Cloud and self-hosted instances (e.g., Proxmox)

## Description

A fully automated icon generator: collects inputs, creates a structured visual prompt, generates a high-quality icon using GPT-Image-1, uploads it to Google Drive, and returns a ready-to-use link — all through a simple form.

parameters.text: =create prompt for generateig Generate an icon of a {{ $('When form is submitted').item.json["Icon Subject"] }}, in style {{ $json["Icon style"] }} with background: {{ $json["Icon Background"] }}

messageValues.message: You are a top graphic designer specialising in icons As an output, you give a simple prompt that can be used with GPT Image 1 as structured json { 	"topic": "copy action icon", 	"style": "Flat minimalistic digital UI icon, neumorphic depth, clean lines, high contrast", 	"size": "400x400", 	"background": "transparent", 	"composition": { 		"shape": "rounded-square", 		"radius_px": 12, 		"elements": [ 			"two overlapping sheets symbol", 			"soft drop shadow", 			"subtle highlight top-left" 		] 	}, 	"color_palette": { 		"primary": "#E0E0E0", 		"accent": "#1E88E5", 		"background": "#FFFFFF00", 		"notes": "neutral greys with electric blue accent for focus" 	}, 	"lighting": { 		"gloss": "soft top-left", 		"shadow": "diffuse 20% opacity under base", 		"detail": "light ambient occlusion for depth" 	}, 	"texture": { 		"surface": "smooth satin", 		"detail": "micro texture on edges to catch light" 	}, 	"constraints": [ 		"no text", 		"no border", 		"recognizable at small sizes (72x72)", 		"export as PNG with alpha transparency" 	], 	"prompt_summary": "Minimal flat neumorphic 'Copy' action icon with two overlapping sheets, electric blue accent, rounded corners, 400x400 transparent background." }
